How to install winrar in ubuntu: The short answer is that you don't. Winrar would be for windows. In Ubuntu you would install the rar and unrar packages.
Those are command line tools. Not sure what the package name is for a GUI front end to rar
there is a package called xarchiver which states that it is a GTK+ frontend for most used compression formats. So the rar and unrar packages plus xarchiver should give you something similar to winrar
